@SenBlumenthal To the U.S. Congress and the European Parliament: Write Kurdish Rights into Syria’s Constitution — Clearly and Without Ambiguity.
Stability in the Middle East depends on constitutionally guaranteed Kurdish rights. https://t.co/6TmxLztCm9
@SenBlumenthal The last thing we need is your greasy hands imposing more tyrannical government policies.

@SenBlumenthal The externalities argument is sound, but "bipartisan legislation" for a $700B industry moving at light speed? By the time the bill clears committee, they'll have spent another $200B. Might want to legislate faster than they iterate.
@SenBlumenthal They already are Blumenthal. So sit down and shut up. No more Dems controlling.
@SenBlumenthal Blumenthal is a pathetic lying traitor to our Country. https://t.co/5oRgmNNd56
